column4: i was trying to insall using aptitude and got this message "No candidate version found for gstreamer0.8-mad

i'm on ubuntu 5.10 on a ppc
2006-05-26T10:47:00.000Z	nickrud	alexcamilo{u}	you need to enable the universe repo, see the following link:
2006-05-26T13:50:00.000Z	nickrud	alexcamilo{u}	try sudo apt-get update & then try the install again. If that doesn't work, you need to fix your /etc/apt/sources.list
